                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the class
        Parameters:
        targetClass - the requested target class
        Returns:
        the generic type of targetClass
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the underlying parameterized class could not be inferred via reflection.

      • getField

        public static java.lang.Object getField(java.lang.Object object,
                        java.lang.String field)
                                 throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Gets a field value from an Object not caring about its scope. Note that only fields from the Class directly are accessible with this method, not from any super Class.

        field -
        Returns:
